message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 19
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
Vocabulary search using LOV 
• Ecosystem of vocabularies used in Linked Open Data 
(RDFS or OWL ontologies)  
• 300 vocabularies described by means of metadata 
• Classified by topics (vocabulary spaces) 
• Linked using VOAF 
• Services 
• Look up 
• Search 
• Metrics 
20 
Linked Open Vocabularies (LOV) 
http://labs.mondeca.com/dataset/lov/
speaker: SYSTEM
